A

ActionCard - Class in cards
ActionCard class represents the class of cards which have special effect after played
ActionCard(String, Color, CardGameMediator) - Constructor for class cards.ActionCard
constructor that initializes the data members with provided type, color, and mediator parameters.
app - package app
this package contains classes that are used to implement the game's flow logic and interaction among players

C

calculateScore(ArrayList<Player>) - Method in class app.Player
calculates the score based on the other players hands
calculateTotalCardPoint() - Method in class app.Player
returns the total point of all cards in hand
Card - Class in cards
Card class is the superclass of all cards in Duo Card Game and acts as an abstract base class for NumberCard and ActionCard classes
Card(String, Color, CardGameMediator) - Constructor for class cards.Card
constructor that initializes the the data members with provided type, color, and mediator parameters.
CardGameMediator - Class in app
CardGameMediator class is responsible for managing Duo Card Game and implements the mediator design pattern to reduce coupling among player objects
CardGameMediator() - Constructor for class app.CardGameMediator
default constructor that initializes data fields as follows currentPlayerPosition as 0 roundNumber as 1 gameDirection as "left" currentCardColor as null shouldDrawCard as false mustDrawCard as false amountOfCardsToBeDrawn as 0 isInitialRound as true isGameFinished as false players as null drawPile as null discardPile as null
cards - package cards
this package contains class Card and all of it's subclasses which are used mainly by classes in package app
checkForDrawTwoCardInHand() - Method in class app.Player
returns a reference to DrawTwoCard object found in cardsInHand.
clearHand() - Method in class app.Player
remove all cards in hand
clone() - Method in class cards.Card
each subclass of Card class must create a override this method for creating a copy of Card object
clone() - Method in class cards.DrawTwoCard
returns a copy of the DrawTwoCard keeping the mediator field reference same.

returns a copy of the NumberCard keeping the mediator field reference same.

clone() - Method in class cards.WildCard

clone() - Method in class cards.WildDrawFourCard
returns a copy of the WildDrawFourCard keeping the mediator field reference same.
Color - Enum Class in helpers
Color enum that represents the color of cards in the Duo Card Game which are blue, green, red, and yellow.
createCSVFileAndHeader(ArrayList<Player>) - Method in class helpers.FileIO
creates CSV file and header according to number of players
createNewDrawPileIfNecessary() - Method in class app.CardGameMediator
if amount of cards to be drawn is greater than or equal to drawPile size then create new drawPile from existing discardPile

DrawTwoCard - Class in cards
DrawTwoCard class triggers next player to draw two cards from deck when played

DuoCardGameApp - Class in app
DuoCardGameApp class acts as the driver class to run the application it creates an instance of CardGameMediator object to run the simulation

NumberCard - Class in cards

ReverseCard - Class in cards

W

WildCard - Class in cards
WildCard changes color of game according to color of the card which occurs most frequent.
WildCard(String, Color, CardGameMediator) - Constructor for class cards.WildCard
constructor that initializes the WildCard object with provided type, color, and mediator parameters.
WildDrawFourCard - Class in cards
WildDrawFourCard changes the color of the game according to color of the card that occurs most frequently and forces next player to draw four cards from draw pile
WildDrawFourCard(String, Color, CardGameMediator) - Constructor for class cards.WildDrawFourCard
constructor that initializes the WildDrawFourCard object with provided type, color, and mediator parameters.
writeRoundInformation(ArrayList<Player>, int) - Method in class helpers.FileIO
writes score for each player to game_status.csv file's appropriate line according to roundNumber
writeWinnerInformation(Player) - Method in class helpers.FileIO
writes winner's name to game_status.csv file as a last line

YELLOW - Enum constant in enum class helpers.Color
